issue.title: [C++][Dataset][Compute] Substitute ExecPlan impl for dataset scans
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13238](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13238). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11930 grew too large to include substitution of an ExecPlan for existing scan machinery, but this still needs to happen

comments.body:
